name: Robots (itch) (Shadowlight Gaming)
description:
WARNING: NO CURRENT GAMEPLAY

Robots is currently a VERY early access game and as such.... is currently lacking "game." We are working hard to fix this issue, but as of right now it is currently just a demo for testing purposes. (Can be fairly relaxing though.)

--------------------------------------------------

Current Version is just a cute (untextured) robot (microphone) running around the screen. Enjoy!
